did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Policy Office Clemency Files of Governor James S. Gilmore, 1998-2001

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Records are restricted (public access and photoduplication) for 75 years after date of record creation per Code of Virginia 42.1-78.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Records are restricted (public access and photoduplication) for 75 years after date of record creation per Code of Virginia 42.1-78.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Policy Office Clemency Files of Governor James S. Gilmore, 1998-2001. Accession 40166. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred on 17 November 2002 by James S. Gilmore, Richmond, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the clemency records of Virginians executed during Governor James S. Gilmore's Administration (1998-2002). Most, but not all, clemency files contain a clemency petition (either a letter or a formal document), legal files (trial transcripts, court rulings, execution orders, etc.) and correspondence from interested parties. Some also include handwritten notes about the petition by the Counselor to the Governor (David E. Anderson, 1998-1999 and Walter S. Felton, Jr., 1999-2002) and/or Governor, meeting notes between the Counselor and attorneys for the condemned and police and prison files. This collection is housed in 27 boxes and is arranged chronologically by date of execution. Dates of record-keeping activity: 1998-2001.

1998 clemency files include: Tony Albert Mackall (executed 1998 February 10), Douglas McArthur Buchanan (executed 1998 March 18), Ronald Watkins (executed 1998 March 25), Angel Breard (executed 1998 April 14), Dennis Wayne Eaton (executed 1998 June 18), Danny Lee King (executed 1998 July 23), Lance Antonio Chandler (executed 1998 August 20), Johnile L. Dubois (executed 1998 August 31), Kenneth Manuel Stewart, Jr. (executed 1998 September 23), Dwayne Allen Wright (executed 1998 October 14), Ronald Fitzgerald (executed 1998 October 21), Kenneth Wilson (executed 1998 November 17), and Kevin Dewayne Cardwell (executed 1998 December 3).

scopecontent.p: 2001 clemency files include: Thomas Wayne Akers (executed 2001 March 1), Walter Mickens, Jr. (execution scheduled for 2001 April 17 but stayed by United States Supreme Court; executed 2002 June 12), and Christopher James Beck (executed 2001 October 18).
